com.sdicons.json.validator.predicates

Class Array

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sdicons.json.validator.predicates.Predicate
      • com.sdicons.json.validator.predicates.Array
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator

    public class Array
extends Predicate
    A predicate to check if a JSON value is an array.

    An example of an array validator. The JSONValue must be an array and it must contain integers. 

     
 {
    "name" :"List of integers",
    "type" :"and",
    "rules" : [{"type":"array"},{"type":"content","rule":{"type":"int"}}]
 }
